backgroundOpacity.description: Controls overlay background-color opacity 0–1, disregarded when gradient prop is set, 0.6 by default
backgroundOpacity.description_zh: 控制叠加背景色不透明度 0–1，设置 gradient prop 时忽略，默认为 0.6

center.description: Determines whether content inside overlay should be vertically and horizontally centered, false by default
center.description_zh: 确定叠加层内的内容是否应垂直和水平居中，默认为 false

fixed.description: Determines whether overlay should have fixed position instead of absolute, false by default
fixed.description_zh: 确定叠加层是否应具有固定位置而不是 absolute，默认情况下为 false

gradient.description: Changes overlay to gradient. If set, color prop is ignored
gradient.description_zh: 将叠加更改为渐变。如果设置，则忽略 color 属性

radius.description: Key of theme.radius or any valid CSS value to set border-radius, 0 by default
